com.sorcix.sirc

Interface AdvancedListener


  • public interface AdvancedListener
    Notified when receiving unknown lines. This allows acting on incoming IRC events not supported by sIRC. Note that sIRC only allows a single instance of AdvancedListener, which means that SIRCServices should not use it.

    Note that if sIRC supports new events in the future the lines will no longer be sent to the AdvancedListener!

    Author:
    Sorcix
